name: Bob The Tree-serator
description: Bob was a simple man, living in a simple crib, when one day, he discovered that all the trees were gone! Furious, he grabbed a floppy disk that was lying around in the trash and threw it. When it touched the ground, a tree grew out of the ground right were the floppy disk was planted! It was at this moment that Bob decided it was enough. With theses, he will going to populate all of the deserted region with trees like it was before the Mens in Black came in (yes, there are mens in black). And it's going to sh** bricks.
